amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase the WIFIA administrative expenses account by $2 million and decrease the DOI Office of the Secretary account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Denham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
